feed.title: Huntarr Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 6.5.8
entry.content:
Remove all refresh operations within Huntarr. By default, it was off... but was problematic with Radarr causing it to get stuck on upgrades no matter what. Since it was pointless to have within the code (been since early Huntarr), it has been removed from all apps.

You'll notice the additional options shrunk by 1 or 2 per app

Thanks to this guy pestering me as he quoted, jk... thanks for the report

What's Changed

  • Skip02 by @Admin9705 in https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/pull/428

Full Changelog: https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/compare/6.5.7...6.5.8

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 6.5.9
entry.content:
What's Changed

People now have two options to pull images. The read me has been updated

  • ci: add Docker build and push workflow for multi-arch images by @Admin9705 in https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/pull/431
  • Dev by @Admin9705 in https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/pull/432

Full Changelog: https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/compare/6.5.8...6.5.9

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 6.5.10
entry.content:
Fixed Bug - Radarr Apps Form (future Released now save along with media type) - Address issue with - https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/issues/429

Full Changelog: https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/compare/6.5.9...6.5.10

entry.title: New release for Huntarr: 6.5.11
entry.content:
Resolves - https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/issues/228 along users to ping huntarr with a return status of OK

Full Changelog: https://github.com/plexguide/Huntarr.io/compare/6.5.10...6.5.11
